-About-

I took my first coding class when I was in high school. And have been hooked ever since. I attended Liberty University from 2014-2019 and received a BS in Business and Web Design. I like to design websites on iPad, using Affinity Designer: then coding the website up in VS Code. My goal is to bring dreams to life with the skills that I developed through code.
